about_the_game:
Embrace the spirit of Christmas fishing adventures with this fun and magical Holiday Pack!
Features a collection of Christmas edition baits and lures, along with the amazing Santa’s Tackle Box backpack - right out of Santa’s personal collection and available ONLY in this Holiday Pack!
The Holiday Pack also includes fireworks, snowballs, and other perks, like a 7-Day Pond Pass with Advanced License for White Moose Lake along with 1 Week of Premium, BaitCoins, Credits and other cool stuff to enhance your Christmas angling adventures!

The Holiday Pack includes:
* 25 BAITCOINS use to purchase certain fishing tackle, available only for BaitCoins. Spend your BaitCoins wisely!
* 25 000 CREDITS use to purchase certain fishing tackle, available only for BaitCoins. Spend your BaitCoins wisely!
* 7 DAYS OF PREMIUM Enjoy thirty days of Premium Status and advance your game progress by getting a 50% boost to Experience and Credits earned for every fish you catch! In addition, you get the opportunity to rent a kayak with a 50% discount! You also get the privilege of free registration in Competitions and the advantage of using free Forward Time function twice as often!
* 25 Storage Slots

BAITS AND LURES
* Minnows: Merry Runner 19 ft (6m), #2/0 (x2)
* Walkers: Jolly Walker 1/2 Oz. (14 g), #3/0 (x2)
* Poppers: Xmas Popper 1/2 Oz.(14 g), #2/0 (x2)
* Spoons: Jolly Spoon 1/4 Oz. (7 g), #1/0 (x10), Jolly Spoon 1 Oz (28 g), #2/0 (x10)
* Jerkbait: Jolly Jerkbait 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #6/0 (x2)
* Spinners: Jolly Nano Spinner 1/8 Oz. (4 g), #1 (x10), Jolly Bullet Spinner 1 1/4 Oz (36 g), #4/0 (x10)
* Jig Heads: 1/2 Oz. (14 g), #4/0 (x10), 1 Oz. (25 g), #4/0 (x10), 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #4/0 (x10)
* Softbaits: Jelly Crayfish 10 cm (x20), Jelly Shad 7 cm (x20)
* Hooks: #1, #1/0, #2/0, #4/0, #6/0, #8/0
* Carp Hooks: #4/0; #6/0
* Baits: Candy Wax Worms, Marmalade Red Worms, Frozen Cutbait, Frozen Shiners, Frozen Minnows, Glazed Crawfish Cut, Caramel Chunks
* Boilies: Snowberry Boilies 1" (25 mm)

EQUIPMENT
* Santa's Tackle Box - Tackles: 30; Lines: 3; Chum Components: 3

EVENT ITEMS:
* Fireworks: Fireshark Epic Rockets; Hellfish Arsonist Kit; Squid-pro-Quo Blaster Pack;12 Monkeys Demolition Set
* Pure Snow

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
* Advanced Alberta License

POND PASSES (7 days):
* White Moose Lake

Embrace the spirit of Christmas fishing adventures with this fun and magical Holiday Pack!
Features a collection of Christmas edition baits and lures, along with the amazing Santa’s Tackle Box backpack - right out of Santa’s personal collection and available ONLY in this Holiday Pack!
The Holiday Pack also includes fireworks, snowballs, and other perks, like a 7-Day Pond Pass with Advanced License for White Moose Lake along with 1 Week of Premium, BaitCoins, Credits and other cool stuff to enhance your Christmas angling adventures!

* 7 DAYS OF PREMIUM Enjoy thirty days of Premium Status and advance your game progress by getting a 50% boost to Experience and Credits earned for every fish you catch! linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

name: Fishing Planet: Holiday Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

short_description: Embrace the spirit of Christmas fishing adventures with this fun and magical Holiday Pack! Features a full collection of ALL the new Christmas edition baits and lures, along with the amazing Santa’s Tackle Box backpack!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Japanese
